comments:
description:
NPE thrown out when multi delete data source after include library

steps to reproduce:
1. import a library containing data source and data set
2. new two data source and data set in report 
3. multi select data sources and delete thwm
4. click ok in reference dialog
5. click on library data source node in data explorer

actual result:
NPE throw out

exception stack trace:
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.model.api.DesignElementHandle.getQualifiedName(DesignElementHandle.java:919)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.util.DEUtil.getDisplayLabel(DEUtil.java:270)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.internal.ui.views.data.providers.DataSourceNodeProvider.getNodeDisplayName(DataSourceNodeProvider.java:71)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.internal.ui.editors.js.JSEditor.updateAnnotationLabel(JSEditor.java:292)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.internal.ui.editors.js.JSEditor.handleSelectionChanged(JSEditor.java:471)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.internal.ui.editors.js.JSEditor.handleSelectionChange(JSEditor.java:668)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.internal.ui.editors.js.JSEditor.performRequest(JSEditor.java:655)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.core.util.mediator.ReportMediator.notifyRequest(ReportMediator.java:121)......
